TempratuurText: I-sensor ye-temperatuure ilinganisa ngokuchanekileyo izinga lokushisa lamanzi. Oku kubalulekile kuba izinga lokushisa linempembelelo enkulu kwiinkqubo ze-biology kunye nomgangatho wamanzi. I-sensor ibonelela ngezilingo ezikhawulezayo nezithembekileyo, ezifanelekileyo kulawulo lwezikhathi zangempela kunye nophando lwezinguquko zoshiso.
PhSensorText: I-sensor ye-pH ilinganisa umphunga wamanzi ngokuhlalutya umxholo we-ion ye-hydrogen (H+). Oku kubalulekile ukutolika utshintsho kwimeko ye-chemistry kunye nokuchonga ukungcola okungenzeka. Ngolwazi oluchanekileyo nolungqinelanayo, i-sensor isekela ukuphathwa kwamanzi ngokuhlala.
TroebelheidText: I-sensor ye-oxygen ilinganisa umphumo wokuphosa kwe-oxygen emanzini, into ebucayi ebomini kumphakathi wezakhamuzi zamanzi. I-sensor ibonelela ngedatha yesikhumbuzo ngokuphosa kwe-oxygen, okuvumela ukubonisa ukungaphumeleli ngokukhawuleza.
ZuurstofText: I-sensor ye-turbidity iqinisekisa ukukhanya kwamanzi ngokulinganisa ubungakanani bokukhanya okudlula emanzini. Oku kusiza ekuchongeni ukungcola okanye iqumbe emanzini, oku kubaluleke kakhulu ekuhloleni umgangatho wamanzi.
